
[TITLE]
<line: 2> IN THE UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT
<line: 3> FOR THE SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF OHIO
<line: 4> EASTERN DIVISION

[TEXT]
<line: 6> United States of America
<line: 7> v.
<line: 8> 2:16-cr-190-2

[TEXT]
<line: 10> Luis Armondo Ruiz               

[TITLE]
<line: 12> ORDER

[TEXT]
<line: 14> There being no objections, the court hereby adopts the Report
<line: 15> and Recommendation of the magistrate judge (Doc. 66) that the
<line: 16> defendant’s guilty plea be accepted.  The court accepts the
<line: 17> defendant’s plea of guilty to the lesser included offense of Count
<line: 18> 1 of the indictment, and he is hereby adjudged guilty on that
<line: 19> offense.  The court will defer the decision of whether to accept
<line: 20> the plea agreement until the sentencing hearing.

[ABANDON]
<line: 22> Date: February 10, 2017           s\James L. Graham         
<line: 23>                             James L. Graham
<line: 24>                             United States District Judge

[TEXT]
